DC_ENABLED
extern BcGlobals bcg;
bc_vm_malloc
bc_vm_realloc
bc_vm_strdup

^void bc_
^BcStatus bc_
^void dc_
^BcStatus dc_
^int bc_
^ssize_t bc_
^size_t bc_
